TopicTitle: Good Luck With this One. Make Jeb Scared.

Articles.Content: A simple yet difficult challenge. There is no scoring simply success. Your goal is to capture a screen-shot of Jebidiah genuinely scared, which means- no smiling, no strait face, must be a frown or a scared yell. Good Luck. (p.s., is this even possible ?)
Explosions can scare Jeb, also, can we see your attempt?

Oh, um, his mouth isn't visible in this picture, but that may mean his smile isn't big right, well i tried, not sure if even jumping out of a jet during reentry will do it.

http://imgur.com/mgdHYs1 (first time sharing a picture)

Good Job Nitro! Usually he's smiling during re-entry. Just for this, i will make this my new focus!
And finally, i got a legit shot of jeb scared. Also included is a failed attempt. http://imgur.com/ZJnWvqj,Asva6BU,P3f4Sz5,qBBtSNu,T8mTwwI#4
Hey,he isn't scared.Its just the added G's that are pulling at the corners of his/(Her?) mouth.
